name: Girl X Mushrooms(少女X蘑菇)
description:
Girls X Mushroom is an indie game developed by Wild Grunt and is a third-person perspective action game. The game emphasizes intense fighting.


Main Features:
  • Various monsters
  • Gorgeous skills
  • BOSS war stimulated
  • Plot structure for the single-line process, do not need multi-week program
  • All plot nodes are automatically saved
  • Many types of traps

Recommended keyboard & mouse
